front.title: Security content automation protocol (SCAP) version 1.3 validation program test requirements

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This report defines the requirements and associated test procedures necessary for products or modules to achieve one or more Security Content Automation Protocol (SCAP) validations. Validation is awarded based on a defined set of SCAP capabilities by independent laboratories that have been accredited for SCAP testing by the NIST National Voluntary Laboratory Accreditation Program (NVLAP)

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
